metadata.title: CVE-2015-1522 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: analyzer/protocol/dnp3/DNP3.cc in Bro before 2.3.2 does not reject certainnon-zero values of a packet length, which allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (buffer overflow or buffer over-read) via a craftedDNP3 packet.

criterions.comment: bro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
